effect.short: Has a $effect_chance% chance to lower the target's accuracy by one stage.
effect.full: Inflicts regular damage.  Has a 50% chance to lower the target's accuracy by one stage.

flavorTexts.text:
The user attacks its target by encircling it in sharp
leaves. This attack may also lower the
target’s accuracy.
